paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a TTR variant associated with familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy, including penetrance data.

individual_records.phenotype_details: early onset with carpal tunnel syndrome
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The syndrome is of early onset (approximate age 35 to 40) with carpal tunnel syndrome.

functional_data.summary: The mutation results in an alanine to threonine substitution in the transthyretin protein.

variants.segregation_data: The mutation segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The mutation was confirmed by amino acid sequencing of transthyretin isolated from the plasma of an affected subject.
key_quotes: A transthyretin mutation was discovered in a French family with familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy.
The predicted alanine for threonine substitution in the transthyretin protein was proven by amino acid sequencing.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
